alreadyTranslator: I see ye already be a translator. Here be what ye may be lookin' fer:
projectLink: Ye may find th' link t' th' project [here](%%link%%).
question: 'Ave a question?
askTranslators: Feel free t' ask anything 'bout th' project on %%botTranslators%%. Do nah forget t' send a link t' th' string ye be referrin' t'!
checkGuide: Check out our guide wit' a bunch o' useful Crowdin tools an' tips t' get started! Ye can find it on %%gettingStarted%%.
newTranslator: Are ye looking t' translate our bot t' yer own lingo?
join: We'd love t' have ye on th' project! Here's how ye can join us:
openProject: First, please open th' project on Crowdin
howOpen: 'Tis can be done by accessin' th' link found [here](%%link%%).
clickLanguage: Now, click on th' lingo ye want t' translate
requestJoin: In order t' join that lingo, ye must hit "Join" an' write a simple message on why ye want t' join th' project.
requestInfo:
When submittin' yer request, please make sure t' include either yer tag (%%tag%%) or yer ID (%%id%%).
**If ye do nah include at least one o' these, ye will be rejected!**
langRequest: 'Tis possible that we do nah support yer lingo yet. If that be th' case, please contact an administrator askin' 'em t' add th' lingo ye want.
